General.Name: First Hi-tec Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: First Hi-tec Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs) in Asia. It offers S/S, D/S, and M/L rigid PCBs; HDI with stacked through PCBs; and MCPCBs. The company's products are used in telecom/network, automotive, semiconductor, and electrician applications. First Hi-tec Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Xingbang Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33068
